title: Hot English Magazine 154 - March 2015 (PDF + Audio)
description:
Hot English Magazine 154 - March 2015 (PDF + Audio) | 95.31 MB

Learn Hot English 154 (the March issue) is out now! Improve your conversation in English. Learn 23 interjections (sounds or short words) to use in conversation. Also, 12 useful words and expressions for talking about housework, 8 expressions for talking about clothes, 10 useful expressions for describing numbers, 8 useful words and expressions for clarifying information, 20 new phrasal verbs and idioms...
